bioconda.name: zdb
bioconda.summary: zDB is both a bacterial comparative genomics pipeline and a tool to visualize the results

biotools.summary: zDB is designed to perform comparative genomics analyses and to integrate the results in a Django web-application. It automates annotating a set of genomes with COGs, KEGGs, PFAMs, AMRs, VFs, Swissprot and RefSeq homolgs as well as orthology inference. It then allows to easily perform comparative genomics analysis in a graphical user interface.
